item.description:
Are you new to the Law of Attraction? You may have heard or seen the popular movie "The Secret," which sparked your interest into thinking positive thoughts which will bring anything you want into creation, including:

Finding Financial Freedom

Manifesting True Love

Living a Better Fulfilling Life

Learning how the Law of Attraction really works can be the grandest gift to yourself. It can open the door to infinite possibilities such as true joy, abundance, and loving relationships.

Yet all too often many people learn only the "basics" of the Law of Attraction, and as a result make several common mistakes that make it appear as though this universal law does not apply to them, and in fact gives them results completely OPPOSITE of what they desire.

We release these myths by exploring:

  • The True Power of Positive Thought
  • The Art of Patience
  • Learning to Let Go
  • Following your Emotions
  • Understanding your Limiting Beliefs

Join us as we unlock the mystery behind the Law of Attraction and Move into a general state of well being.

This Meet-up is Ideal for those who are new to The Law of Attraction and I welcome all experienced members to join me in guiding our newer members through knowledge and example.

Here is a link to Abraham-Hick website.
http://www.lawofattractioninteraction.com/meditation-cd.php

Join us in connecting with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson and creating the change we desire.

We will be meet from 10:30-12:00.
See you there!
Please call for if you have any question.
Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the back Closed off Room

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Law of Attraction 101: Creating Change
